caption.courtNameFormat: IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF {COUNTY} COUNTY, KANSAS
caption.sampleTemplate:
IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF {COUNTY} COUNTY, KANSAS

{PLAINTIFFS},

     Plaintiff(s),

v.

{DEFENDANTS},

     Defendant(s).

Case No. {CASE_NUMBER}

{MOTION_TITLE}

jurat.language: I, {NAME}, declare under penalty of perjury under the laws of the State of Kansas that the foregoing is true and correct. Executed on {DATE}.
jurat.federalOverride: I declare under penalty of perjury that the foregoing is true and correct. Executed on {DATE}.

implementationNotes: Kansas District Court is the trial court of general jurisdiction
Johnson County (Kansas City suburbs) and Sedgwick County (Wichita) are the busiest districts
Standard formatting with letter paper and 1-inch margins
